title: Why Tom Brady Retired Now and How He Forever Changed the NFL
description:
Kevin Clark and Benjamin Solak react to Tom Brady's retirement from the NFL. They discuss Brady's career and legacy, where the NFL will go from here, the Buccaneers' future, and more.

Hosts: Kevin Clark and Benjamin Solak
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
